a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (24)

p.k:
Barbazoo can't say ''no'' / The doppelganger Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy.
By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out? (2020)
